hero_text: QA Engineer, 2 years of experience in testing, focused on automated testing with Playwright (TypeScript).
about_paragraph1: I'm Eric Rodrigues Diniz, 24 years old, currently in the 7th semester of the Software Engineering course at PUC Minas (Lourdes Campus). This semester, I'm diving into topics such as software production management, mobile and distributed application development, system security and auditing, as well as advanced topics in software engineering. I've also started my Graduation Project, consolidating the knowledge acquired throughout the course.
about_paragraph2: I'm a professional passionate about Software Quality, Test Automation, and Full Stack Development. My expertise lies in creating efficient and scalable solutions, ensuring clean, well-structured, and testable code.
about_paragraph3: I have strong experience in Backend (Node.js with Express and Spring Boot) and Frontend (Next.js and Nuxt.js), applying SOLID principles and Clean Code to build robust and maintainable systems. I also have work experience in both Manual and Automated QA, working for 2 years with Playwright and TypeScript for frontend and API regression tests. I have also performed integration tests using Axios and TypeScript. I contributed to building a testing platform at MOVA SEP SA using Nuxt.js, Pinia, and Axios on the frontend, while the backend was developed in PHP with Hyperf.
